DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the efficacy of two lubricating eye drops for the treatment of dry eye signs and symptoms.
DOC.brief_title: Cross-Over Evaluation of Two Lubricating Eye Drops
DOC.criteria: 1. Patients 18 yrs or older 2. Males or females 3. Any race or ethnic background 4. Patients with present ocular surface discomfort and a SESoD score of at least 2 1. Corneal refractive surgery within 6 months of this study. 2. Contact lens use on day of examination. 3. Corneal ectasia. 4. Current use of Restasis
